MAIN_MESSAGE: We apologise that today's pre arranged work affecting your property in the TD9 postcode area of Newcastleton is still ongoing. This is due to urgent tree cutting and we now expect power to be back on by 5.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3.14pm on Tuesday 19th January 2021.
